name: International Summit on Electronics and Electrical Engineering
content: The International Summit on Electronics and Electrical Engineering is a prestigious event organized with a motivation to provide an excellent international platform for the academicians, researchers, engineers, industrial participants and budding students around the world to SHARE their research findings with the global experts. Electrical Summit 2024 will be held at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on July 01-02, 2024.The main theme of the conference is “Exchange of Technological Advances in the field of Electronics and Electrical Engineering”
